description: This file defines the interface IEventHandler with virtual methods to handle various OCI container events, including start, stop, failure, and state change events. It is part of the WPEFramework Plugin namespace.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: Interface for handling OCI container lifecycle and state events in the plugin.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStartedEvent
methods.description: Handles the event when an OCI container starts.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStoppedEvent
methods.description: Handles the event when an OCI container stops.

methods.name: onOCIContainerFailureEvent
methods.description: Handles the event when an OCI container fails.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStateChangedEvent
methods.description: Handles the event when an OCI container's state changes.
